issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: CloudFormation stack DELETE_FAILED by trying to delete SG from wrong VPC

comments.body:
[~shaon], one possible cause for the stack resource deletion failures would be another instance running in the VPC using the same subnet and security group. How does the reported run instances error relate to the deletion failure?

{code}
2016-03-24 15:20:16 ERROR 000219883 VmControl                | java.lang.RuntimeException: Failed to find security group: sg-0262aa47, for vpc: vpc-937be8d8 for null
java.lang.RuntimeException: Failed to find security group: sg-0262aa47, for vpc: vpc-937be8d8 for null
...
        at com.eucalyptus.vm.VmControl.runInstances(VmControl.java:241)
...
{code}

Mistakenly paste the vm run error, by realizing that is related while filing the bug, now when I saw the timeline, looks like it's from a different error, thanks.

I will don't remember if I had any resources under that VPC, I will try again and update the ticket.
Thanks [~sjones]. I think you are right about existing resource in the same vpc. I tried the same template on a different cloud, couldn't reproduce the issue.
